title: Language filter
body:
Hello everyone,

I am writing to mention a case of excessive language filtering that hinders communication.
In Hungarian, the word 'ann치l' is a fairly commonly used comparative term. 
'Ann치l ink치bb' - all the more
'Jobb ann치l' - Better than that
etc.

While I am aware of what you guys wanted to filter out, it seems a bit too much in this case.

replies.body: I could see where that might be mistaken for an *actual* inappropriate word here in NA, but it wouldn't make much sense for that to be filtered out of its native regions since it's not actually inappropriate at all as far as I could tell. If it keeps filtering over on EUW, I'd suggest reaching out to one of their agents to see if they could update it possibly?

Usually language filters are server specific to my knowledge, and so it's probably best for you to post this either on the EU boards and/or file a support ticket for them to look into it - it may be filtered on the North American servers (as the supported languages here do not include Hungarian to my knowledge), but may very well be an oversight on the EUNE servers. It could also be that it was commonly abused and so it was just filtered for everyone.
